entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13 except minus 9 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 9 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
